bibleVersesForHabits.niv: A consistent bedtime is more important than a consistent wake time.
Eight hours of sleep makes a big difference for me, and I try hard to make that a priority.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 젊었을 때 수면을 무시했던 것을 후회한다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: I used to think sleep was a waste of time, but I've learned it's actually essential.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 해가 지면 쉬고 해가 뜨면 일어나라
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Rest when the sun sets, rise when the sun rises.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 사람들의 이름을 기억하라, 그것이 그들에게 가장 달콤한 소리다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: A person's name is to that person the sweetest sound in any language.
Any fool can criticize, but it takes character to be understanding.
You can make more friends in two months by being interested in them than in two years by trying to get them interested in you.
Seek first to understand, then to be understood.
Make deposits in the emotional bank account.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 사람들은 당신이 한 말이나 행동보다 느낌을 기억한다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: People will forget what you said, but they will never forget how you made them feel.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 자기가 원하지 않는 것을 남에게 베풀지 말라
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Do not do to others what you do not want done to yourself.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 벗이 먼 곳에서 찾아오니 또한 즐겁지 아니한가
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Is it not a joy to have friends come from afar?

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 강한 사람은 남을 이기지만 현명한 사람은 자신을 이긴다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Knowing others is intelligence; knowing yourself is true wisdom.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 친구는 하나의 영혼이 두 몸에 깃든 것이다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: What is a friend? A single soul dwelling in two bodies.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 말하기 전에 세 가지를 생각하라: 진실인가, 선한가, 필요한가
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Before you speak, ask yourself: Is it true? Is it kind? Is it necessary?

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 우리에게는 두 개의 귀와 하나의 입이 있다, 말하기보다 두 배로 들으라는 뜻이다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: We have two ears and one mouth so we can listen twice as much as we speak.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 다른 사람의 잘못에 시간을 쓰지 말고 자신을 돌아보라
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: The best revenge is to be unlike him who performed the injury.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 취약함을 드러내는 용기가 진정한 연결을 만든다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Vulnerability is the birthplace of connection.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 경계선은 관계를 끊는 것이 아니라 건강하게 만든다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Daring to set boundaries is about having the courage to love ourselves.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 모든 비판 뒤에는 충족되지 않은 욕구가 있다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Behind every criticism is an unmet need.
Observe without evaluating.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 진정으로 듣는다는 것은 임시로 자신을 제쳐두는 것이다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: When someone really hears you without judgment, it feels damn good.
We must be willing to learn our spouse's primary love language.
Small things often: that's the secret.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 갈등이 문제가 아니라 다루는 방식이 문제다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: It's not the presence of conflict that's the problem, it's how you handle it.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 행복한 가정은 모두 비슷하지만 불행한 가정은 각기 다르다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.
Let there be spaces in your togetherness.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 친구를 얻는 유일한 방법은 스스로 친구가 되는 것이다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: The only way to have a friend is to be one.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 가장 위대한 선물은 관심을 주는 것이다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: The greatest gift is a portion of thyself.
Don't walk in front of me, I may not follow. Walk beside me and be my friend.
Between stimulus and response there is a space. In that space is our power to choose.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 친절한 말은 짧고 쉬워도 그 메아리는 영원하다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Kind words can be short and easy to speak, but their echoes are truly endless.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 작은 친절과 작은 사랑의 행위가 세상을 평화롭게 한다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Little strokes fell great oaks.
When making friends, observe their companions.
Joy shared is joy doubled.
Only when we possess nothing can we truly meet.
Understanding is love's other name.

bibleVersesForHabits.krv: 우정은 불필요하지만 철학처럼 가치가 없는 것은 아니다
bibleVersesForHabits.niv: Friendship is unnecessary, like philosophy, like art. It has no survival value; rather it is one of those things which give value to survival.
